languages.text: "Мы с тобой оба в ловушке, Вольный Торговец. Но, в отличие от тебя, я хотя бы понимаю ее масштабы". {n}Ваше оружие искрит и отскакивает, не в силах пробить странный экран. Саргона бросает быстрый взгляд на один из генераторов в стороне, будто проверяя его сохранность.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Мы с тобой оба в ловушке, Вольный Торговец. Но, в отличие от тебя, я хотя бы понимаю ее масштабы". {n}Ваше оружие искрит и отскакивает, не в силах пробить странный экран. Саргона бросает быстрый взгляд на один из генераторов в стороне, будто проверяя его сохранность.{/n}

languages.text: "We are both trapped here, Rogue Trader. But unlike you, I at least grasp the scale of the situation." {n}Your weapon sparks and rebounds, unable to pierce the screen. Sargona casts a quick glance at one of the generators off to the side, as if checking that it is still intact.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Мы с тобой оба в ловушке, Вольный Торговец. Но, в отличие от тебя, я хотя бы понимаю ее масштабы". {n}Ваше оружие искрит и отскакивает, не в силах пробить странный экран. Саргона бросает быстрый взгляд на один из генераторов в стороне, будто проверяя его сохранность.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "We are both trapped here, Rogue Trader. But unlike you, I at least grasp its scale." {n}Your weapon sparks and rebounds, unable to pierce the strange screen. Sargona casts a quick glance at one of the generators off to the side, as if checking that it is still intact.{/n}

"We are both trapped here, Rogue Trader. But unlike you, I at least grasp its scale." {n}Your weapon sparks and rebounds, unable to pierce the strange screen. Sargona casts a quick glance at one of the generators off to the side, as if checking that it is still intact.{/n}

"We are both trapped here, Rogue Trader. But unlike you, I at least grasp the scale of the situation." {n}Your weapon sparks and rebounds, unable to pierce the screen. Sargona casts a quick glance at one of the generators off to the side, as if checking that it is still intact.{/n}

"We are both trapped here, Rogue Trader. But unlike you, I at least grasp the scale of the situation." {n}Your weapon sparks and rebounds, unable to pierce the screen. Sargona casts a quick glance at one of the generators off to the side, as if checking that it is still intact.{/n}

languages.text: 「二人ともここに閉じ込められている、ローグトレーダー。だが、お前とは違って、少なくとも事態の規模は分かっている」{n}武器は火花を散らして弾かれ、スクリーンを貫けない。サルゴナは脇のジェネレーターの一つに素早く目をやり、まだ無事か確かめるようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: "We are both trapped here, Rogue Trader. But unlike you, I at least grasp the scale of the situation." {n}Your weapon sparks and rebounds, unable to pierce the screen. Sargona casts a quick glance at one of the generators off to the side, as if checking that it is still intact.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「二人ともここに閉じ込められている、ローグトレーダー。だが、お前とは違って、少なくとも事態の規模は分かっている。」{n}武器は火花を散らして弾かれ、スクリーンを貫けない。サルゴナは脇のジェネレーターの一つに素早く目をやり、まだ無事か確かめるようだ。{/n}

languages.text: «Estamos los dos atrapados, Comerciante Independiente. Pero yo al menos soy consciente de la magnitud de esta situación». {n}Tu arma rebota echando chispas, incapaz de atravesar la pantalla. Sargona mira de soslayo uno de los generadores que hay al lado, como si quisiera comprobar que sigue intacto.{/n}
languages.original_text: "We are both trapped here, Rogue Trader. But unlike you, I at least grasp the scale of the situation." {n}Your weapon sparks and rebounds, unable to pierce the screen. Sargona casts a quick glance at one of the generators off to the side, as if checking that it is still intact.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Estamos los dos atrapados, Comerciante Independiente. Pero yo al menos soy consciente de la magnitud de esta situación». {n}Tu arma rebota echando chispas, incapaz de atravesar la pantalla. Sargona mira de soslayo uno de los generadores que hay al lado, como si quisiera comprobar que sigue intacto.{/n}

languages.text: “我们两个都被困在这里了，行商浪人。但我和你不一样，我很清楚眼下的形势。”{n}你的武器火花迸射，弹了回来，没能穿透屏障。萨戈纳瞥了一眼旁边的发电机，似乎在检查发电机是否完好无损。{/n}
languages.original_text: "We are both trapped here, Rogue Trader. But unlike you, I at least grasp the scale of the situation." {n}Your weapon sparks and rebounds, unable to pierce the screen. Sargona casts a quick glance at one of the generators off to the side, as if checking that it is still intact.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我们两个都被困在这里了，行商浪人。但我和你不一样，我很清楚眼下的形势。”{n}你的武器火花迸射，弹了回来，没能穿透屏障。萨戈纳瞥了一眼旁边的发电机，似乎在检查发电机是否完好无损。{/n}

languages.text: "Wir sitzen hier beide in der Falle, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Aber im Gegensatz zu Euch erkenne ich wenigstens den Ernst der Lage." {n}Deine Waffe prallt Funken sprühend zurück und kann den Bildschirm nicht durchbohren. Sargona wirft einen raschen Blick auf einen der Generatoren an der Seite, als wolle er prüfen, ob er noch intakt ist.{/n}
languages.original_text: "We are both trapped here, Rogue Trader. But unlike you, I at least grasp the scale of the situation." {n}Your weapon sparks and rebounds, unable to pierce the screen. Sargona casts a quick glance at one of the generators off to the side, as if checking that it is still intact.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Wir sitzen hier beide in der Falle, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Aber im Gegensatz zu Euch erkenne ich wenigstens den Ernst der Lage." {n}Deine Waffe prallt Funken sprühend zurück und kann den Bildschirm nicht durchbohren. Sargona wirft einen raschen Blick auf einen der Generatoren an der Seite, als wolle er prüfen, ob er noch intakt ist.{/n}

languages.text: « Nous sommes tous les deux pris au piège ici, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Mais moi, au moins, j'ai la mesure de la situation. » {n}Votre arme rebondit dans une gerbe d'étincelles, incapable de percer l'écran. Sargona lance un rapide coup d'œil à l'un des générateurs sur le côté, comme pour vérifier qu'il est toujours intact.{/n}
languages.original_text: "We are both trapped here, Rogue Trader. But unlike you, I at least grasp the scale of the situation." {n}Your weapon sparks and rebounds, unable to pierce the screen. Sargona casts a quick glance at one of the generators off to the side, as if checking that it is still intact.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Nous sommes tous les deux pris au piège ici, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Mais moi, au moins, j'ai la mesure de la situation. » {n}Votre arme rebondit dans une gerbe d'étincelles, incapable de percer l'écran. Sargona lance un rapide coup d'œil à l'un des générateurs sur le côté, comme pour vérifier qu'il est toujours intact.{/n}

languages.text: "İkimiz de burada kapana kısılı vaziyetteyiz Hür Tacir. Senden farklı olarak ben, en azından durumun vahametinin farkındayım." {n}Silahın kıvılcımlar saçıyor, tuhaf ekrana nüfuz edemeden sekiyor. Sargona, sanki hâlâ sağlam olup olmadığını kontrol ediyormuş gibi yan taraftaki jeneratörlerden birine hızla göz atıyor.{/n}

Sargona casts a quick glance at one of the generators off to the side, as if checking that it is still intact.{/n}
